channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Transform the way you investigate by using Behaviors & new detections in XDR, starting w/SaaS apps
item.description: Security teams have conducted their investigation using two layers of data – raw activities and alerts which previously gave them the insight they needed to effectively respond to an alert. However, with attacks becoming more advanced and spanning across multiple vectors, this has led to Security Operations Centers (SOC) being overloaded with signals resulting in alert fatigue. We are thrilled to introduce a brand-new data type, called Behaviors in Microsoft 365 Defender, that will transform how you investigate alerts across all your workloads, starting with SaaS apps. In combination with Beha...
